text: ao banda anak del mean chomnue. chaur chiesaveang aoy chhngay pi brakear sangsay( towleu anak del mean chomnue) . pitabrakd nasa kar sangsay muoychamnuon kuchea babakamm . haey chaur puok anak kom saeubkear ( brakear del minola robsa anak mean chomnue) ning kom niyeay daem knea aoy saoh . tae mneak knongchamnaom puok anak chaul chetd saisaeach bangobaaun robsa ke del slab ryy? dau che neah puok anak pitchea khpaem vea minkhan . haey chaur puok anak kaotakhlach a l laoh . pitabrakd nasa a l laoh chea anak ttuol yk nouv kar sarphap tosakamhosa mha anet sraleanh
